anya-e0803n7:1_0: Atha pubbācariyamataṁ purecaraṁ katvā niggahītantapulliṅgānaṁ bhavanta karontaiccādikassa pakatirūpassa nāmikapadamālaṁ vakkhāma –
anya-e0803n7:2_0: Gacchaṁ mahaṁ caraṁ tiṭṭhaṁ, dadaṁ bhuñjaṁ suṇaṁ pacaṁ;
anya-e0803n7:3_0: Jayaṁ jaraṁ cavaṁ mīyaṁ, saraṁ kubbaṁ japaṁ vajaṁ.
anya-e0803n7:4_0: Gacchaṁ, gacchanto, gacchantā. Gacchantaṁ, gacchante. Gacchatā, gacchantehi, gacchanteti. Gacchato, gacchantassa, gacchantānaṁ, gacchataṁ. Gacchatā, gacchantehi, gacchantebhi. Gacchato, gacchantassa, gacchantānaṁ, gacchataṁ. Gacchati, gacchantesu. Bho gacchaṁ, bho gacchā, bhavanto gacchanto.
anya-e0803n7:5_0: Gacchādīni aññāni ca taṁsadisānaṁ evaṁ ñeyyānīti yamakamahātheramataṁ.
anya-e0803n7:5_1: Kiñcāpettha tatiyekavacanaṭṭhānādīsu ‘‘gacchantena, gacchantā, gacchantasmā, gacchantamhā, gacchantasmiṁ,
anya-e0803n7:6_8: mahaṁ’’iccādīnañca sānusārālapanekavacanappayogānaṁ adassanato ‘‘gacchanto bhāradvājo. Sa gacchaṁ na nivattati.
anya-e0803n7:6_9: Mahanto lokasannivāso’’tiādīnaṁ pana paccattekavacanappayogānaññeva dassanato tādisāni rūpāni anijjhānakkhamāni viya maññāma.
anya-e0803n7:6_12: Tathā hi tattha ‘‘mahaṁ bhavaṁ caraṁ tiṭṭha’’nti gāthaṁ vatvā ‘‘mahaṁ tiṭṭhati, mahanto tiṭṭhantī’’ti ca, ‘‘bho mahā, bhavanto mahanto’’ti ca, ‘‘bhavaṁ tiṭṭhati,
anya-e0803n7:7_1: bhavanto’’ti padāni yattha ‘‘honto hontā’’ti kriyatthaṁ na vadanti, tattha ‘‘bhavaṁ kaccāno.
anya-e0803n7:7_2: Mā bhavanto evaṁ avacutthā’’tiādīsu viya aññasmiṁ atthe patanato ekavacanabahuvacanāni bhavanti,
anya-e0803n7:7_3: tasmā ‘‘santo sappurisā loke’’ti ettha ‘‘santo’’ti padassa viya ‘‘arahanto sammāsambuddhā’’ti ettha ‘‘arahanto’’ti padassa viya ca ‘‘bhavanto’’ti padassa bahuvacanattaṁ nijjhānakkhamaṁ. ‘‘Mahanto, caranto,
anya-e0803n7:7_4: tiṭṭhanto’’tiādīnaṁ pana bahuvacanattaṁ na nijjhānakkhamaṁ viya amhe paṭibhāti. Na hi katthacipi ‘‘santo, arahanto,
anya-e0803n7:7_6: caranto’’tiādīnaṁ anekapadasatānaṁ bahuvacanantatāpayoge passāma. Tathā hi –
anya-e0803n7:15_0: Ekassapi bahukatte, pavatti na tu dissati.
anya-e0803n7:17_0: Gahaṇe sati bahavo, dosā dissanti saccato.
anya-e0803n7:18_0: Yathekamhi ghare daḍḍhe, daḍḍhā sāmīpikā gharā;
anya-e0803n7:22_0: Evaṁ santepi yasmā ‘‘niruttipiṭakaṁ nāma pabhinnapaṭisambhidena mahākhīṇāsavena mahākaccāyanena kata’’nti loke pasiddhaṁ,
anya-e0803n7:22_3: tathāpi pāḷinayaṁ garuṁ katvā diṭṭhenekavacananayena adiṭṭho bahuvacananayo chaḍḍetabbo.
anya-e0803n7:22_4: Evaṁ sati niggahītantesu nayo sobhano bhavati. Ayaṁ pana amhākaṁ ruci –
anya-e0803n7:23_0: ‘‘Bhavaṁ karaṁ arahaṁ saṁ, mahaṁ’’ iti padāni tu;
anya-e0803n7:25_0: ‘‘Gacchaṁ caraṁ dadaṁ tiṭṭhaṁ, cintayaṁ bhāvayaṁ vadaṁ;
anya-e0803n7:29_0: Tatra tāva bhavantasaddassa nāmikapadamālā vuccati – bhavaṁsaddo hi ‘‘vaḍḍhanto, honto’’ti atthepi vadati.
anya-e0803n7:30_0: Bhavaṁ, bhavanto, bhavantā. Bhavantaṁ, bhavante. Bhavantena, bhavantehi, bhavantebhi. Bhavantassa, bhavantānaṁ. Bhavantā, bhavantasmā, bhavantamhā, bhavantehi, bhavantebhi. Bhavantassa, bhavantānaṁ. Bhavante, bhavantasmiṁ, bhavantamhi, bhavantesu. He bhavanta, he bhavantā.
anya-e0803n7:31_2: Tathā hi ‘‘suvijāno bhavaṁ hoti. Dhammakāmo bhavaṁ hoti.
anya-e0803n7:31_6: udake mandī bhavante dahato udakaṁ gaṅgāya otaratī’’ti payogā bhavanti,
anya-e0803n7:31_8: Ettha bhavaṁsaddamattaṁ vajjetvā gacchamānacaramānasaddādīsu viya bhavantasadde ‘‘bhavanto,
anya-e0803n7:32_0: Ayañca viseso ‘‘bhavanto’’ti padaṁ vaḍḍhanabhavanatthato aññatthe vattamānaṁ bahuvacanameva hoti,
anya-e0803n7:32_4: Samaṇena nāma īdisesu kammesu abyāvaṭena bhavitabbaṁ,
anya-e0803n7:32_5: evaṁ bhavanto hi samaṇo susamaṇo assā’’ti.
anya-e0803n7:32_6: ‘‘Bhavaṁ’’ iti padaṁ pana ubhayatthāpi ekavacanameva, tasmā idāni ‘‘bhavaṁ ānando. Bhavanto āgacchanti, appasaddā bhavanto hontu,
anya-e0803n7:32_7: mā bhonto saddamakatthā’’ti evamādipayogadassanavasena vohāravisese pavattaṁ aññaṁ atthaṁ paṭicca aparāpi nāmikapadamālā vuccate –
anya-e0803n7:33_0: Bhavaṁ, bhavanto, bhonto. Bhavantaṁ, bhavante. Bhavatā, bhotā, bhavantena, bhavantehi, bhavantebhi. Bhavato, bhoto, bhavantassa, bhavantānaṁ, bhavataṁ. Bhavatā, bhotā, bhavantehi, bhavantebhi. Bhavato, bhoto, bhavantassa, bhavantānaṁ, bhavataṁ. Bhavati, bhavante, bhavantasmiṁ, bhavantamhi, bhavantesu. Bho, bhavanto, bhonto iti.
anya-e0803n7:34_0: Ettha pana ‘‘bho’’iccādīni tīṇi padāni yasmā vohāravisesapavattāni ālapanapadāni honti, tasmā ‘‘āvuso,
anya-e0803n7:34_1: bhante’’ti padāni viya bhosaddādiupapadavantāni na bhavanti, ‘‘bho purisa, bhavanto brāhmaṇā, bhonto samaṇā,
anya-e0803n7:34_2: bho rāja’’iccādīsu hi purisasaddādayoyeva bhosaddādi upapadavanto bhavanti.
anya-e0803n7:34_3: Idha ca ‘‘bhavaṁ ānando’’ti ettha bhavaṁsaddena samānatthāni ‘‘bho, bhavanto, bhonto’’ti padāni vuttāni,
anya-e0803n7:34_4: na pana ‘‘dhammakāmo bhavaṁ hotī’’ti ettha bhavaṁsaddena samānatthāni.
anya-e0803n7:34_5: Paṭhamasmiñhi naye vaḍḍhanatthavasena ‘‘bho bhavanta, bhavanto bhavantā,
anya-e0803n7:34_6: bhonto bhavantā’’ti bhosaddādayo ālapanapadānaṁ upapadāni bhavanti, na dutiyasmiṁ naye.
anya-e0803n7:34_8: bhonto bhonto’’ti padāni bhavanti yathā ‘‘bhante bhante’’ti.
anya-e0803n7:35_0: Atridaṁ bhūdhātuvasena saṅkhepato pāḷinidassanaṁ – kasmā bhavaṁ vijjanamaraññanissito.
anya-e0803n7:35_1: Kathaṁ panāhaṁ bho taṁ bhavantaṁ gotamaṁ jānissāmi.
anya-e0803n7:35_2: Evaṁ bhoti kho ambaṭṭho māṇavo brāhmaṇassa pokkharasātissa paṭissutvā. Mā bhavanto evaṁ avacuttha. Imaṁ bhonto nisāmetha. Evaṁ bho purisa jānāhi,
anya-e0803n7:36_2: ‘‘Bho purisā’’tiādīsu tesaṁ nipātānipātabhāve vivādo na karaṇīyo.
anya-e0803n7:36_5: Tathā hi niruttimañjūsāyaṁ vuttaṁ ‘‘bhotidaṁ āmantanatthe nipāto.
anya-e0803n7:36_7: atha kho bahuvacanampi hotīti ‘bho purisā’ti bahuvacanappayogopi gahito.
anya-e0803n7:36_8: ‘Bhavanto’ti padaṁ pana bahuvacanameva hotīti ‘purisā’ti puna vutta’’nti.
anya-e0803n7:36_9: Pāḷiyañhi aṭṭhakathāsu ca nipātabhūto bhosaddo ekavacanabahuvacanavasena dvidhā dissati,
anya-e0803n7:36_12: Tesu bhosaddassa nipātapadattā āhaccabhāsite nijjīvālapane itthiliṅgavisayo ‘‘ummujja bho puthusile,
anya-e0803n7:52_0: Jīvaṁva lokiyā loke, ālapanti kadāci tu.
anya-e0803n7:57_0: Atha vā pana bhosaddo, nipāto sopadaṁ viya;
anya-e0803n7:60_0: Yasmā diṭṭho tato viññū, dviliṅgeyeva taṁ vade.
anya-e0803n7:65_0: Duppayogaṁ na taṁ yasmā, vohārakusalena ve;
anya-e0803n7:66_0: Jinena bhāsite dhamme, duppayogā na vijjare.
anya-e0803n7:69_0: Evaṁ bhavantasaddassa nāmikapadamālā pāḷinayānurūpaṁ dvidhā vibhattā vaḍḍhanabhavanatthatadaññatthavasena.
anya-e0803n7:71_0: Karaṁ, karonto, karontā. Karontaṁ, karonte. Karotā, karontena, karontehi, karontebhi. Karoto, karontassa, karontānaṁ, karotaṁ. Karotā, karontā, karontasmā, karontamhā, karontehi, karontebhi. Karoto, karontassa, karontānaṁ, karotaṁ. Karonte, karontasmiṁ, karontamhi, karontesu. Bho karonta,
anya-e0803n7:72_0: ‘‘Karoto na kariyati pāpa’’nti idamettha karotosaddassa atthitānidassanaṁ.
anya-e0803n7:74_0: Arahaṁ, arahanto. Arahantaṁ, arahante. Arahatā, arahantena, arahantehi, arahantebhi. Arahato, arahantassa, arahantānaṁ, arahataṁ. Arahatā, arahantā, arahantasmā, arahantamhā, arahantehi, arahantebhi. Arahato, arahantassa, arahantānaṁ, arahataṁ. Arahante, arahantasmiṁ , arahantamhi, arahantesu. Bho arahanta,
anya-e0803n7:75_0: Ayaṁ guṇavācakassa arahantasaddassa nāmikapadamālā. ‘‘Arahā, arahanto, arahantā’’iti ca.
anya-e0803n7:75_2: Uttarimanussadhammapāḷiyaṁ pana ‘‘mayañcamhā anarahanto’’ti padaṁ dissati. Arahantaṁ, arahante. Arahatā, sesaṁ vitthāretabbaṁ.
anya-e0803n7:76_0: Tathā hi ‘‘arahaṁ sammāsambuddho. Arahaṁ sugato loke.
anya-e0803n7:76_1: Arahanto sammāsambuddhā’’tiādīsu arahaṁsaddādayo guṇavācakā. ‘‘Arahā ahosi. Ahañhi arahā loke. Eko arahā,
anya-e0803n7:77_0: Gāme vā yadi vāraññe, ninne vā yadi vā thale;
anya-e0803n7:79_2: Yadi evaṁ āsavakkhayaṁ pattā itthī kathaṁ vattabbā,
anya-e0803n7:79_4: Itthī tāva ‘‘yaṁ itthī arahaṁ assa sammāsambuddho’’ti vacanato ‘‘araha’’nti vattabbā guṇavasena,
anya-e0803n7:81_0: Saṁ, santo, santo, santā. Saṁ, santaṁ, sante. Satā, santena, santehi, santebhi, sabbhi. Sato, santassa, santānaṁ, sataṁ, satānaṁ. Satā, santā, santasmā, santamhā, santehi, santebhi, sabbhi. Sato, santassa, santānaṁ, sataṁ, satānaṁ. Sati, sante, santasmiṁ, santamhi, santesu. Bho santa,
anya-e0803n7:82_0: Ettha pana ‘‘addhā hi tāta satanesa dhammo’’ti jayaddisajātakapāḷidassanato ‘‘satāna’’nti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0803n7:82_1: Tattha hi satanesāti satānaṁ esāti chedo,
anya-e0803n7:82_3: Tathā hi tadaṭṭhakathāyaṁ ‘‘addhā ekaṁsena esa tāta satānaṁ paṇḍitānaṁ dhammo sabhāvo’’ti attho vutto.
anya-e0803n7:82_4: Ayaṁ ye loke ‘‘sappurisā’’ti ca ‘‘ariyā’’ti ca ‘‘paṇḍitā’’ti ca vuccanti,
anya-e0803n7:82_5: tesaṁ vācakassa santasaddassa nāmikapadamālā. Tappaṭisedhassa pana asaṁ, asanto, katthaci asantā iccapi.
anya-e0803n7:82_7: tāta tātāti bhāsare’’ti pāḷi dissati. ‘‘Asaṁ, asantaṁ, asante. Asatā’’tiādinā yojetabbā. Imasmiṁ atthe ‘‘santo,
anya-e0803n7:82_8: asanto’’timāni bahuvacanakāniyeva bhavanti, na katthacipi ekavacanakāni. Kasmā? Paṇṇattivācakattā. Aññatra pana ‘‘santo,
anya-e0803n7:83_0: Idāni paṇṇattivācakānaṁ tesaṁ kānici payogāni kathayāma –
anya-e0803n7:84_0: Sameti asatā asaṁ. Yaṁ yañhi rāja bhajati, santaṁ vā yadi vā asaṁ.
anya-e0803n7:84_1: Na sā sabhā yattha na santi santo. Asanto nirayaṁ yanti, santo saggaparāyaṇā. Asante nopaseveyya, sante seveyya paṇḍito. Sabbhireva samāsetha.
anya-e0803n7:85_0: Yo panamhehi padamālāyaṁ ‘‘sabbhī’’ti ayaṁ saddo tatiyāpañcamībahuvacanavasena yojito,
anya-e0803n7:85_5: Sabbo cāyamattho sāṭṭhakathāya ‘‘bahumpetaṁ asabbhi jātavedā’’ti imāya pāḷiyā ‘‘santo have sabbhi pavedayantī’’ti imāya ca dīpetabbo.
anya-e0803n7:88_0: Atrāyaṁ yojanā – bho sabbhi tiṭṭha, sabbhi tiṭṭhati, sabbhi saha gacchati, sabbhi apehi, asabbhirūpo puriso. Yasmā panāyaṁ sāsanānukūlā,
anya-e0803n7:88_1: tasmā imissā tadanukūlattaṁ dassetuṁ idha sāsanato payoge dassessāma atakkāvacare vicitte sugatapāḷinaye sotūnaṁ visāradamatipaṭilābhatthaṁ. Taṁ yathā? Bahumpetaṁ asabbhi jātaveda,
anya-e0803n7:88_2: yaṁ taṁ vāladhinā’bhipūjayāma. Sabbhi kubbetha santhavaṁ. Yaṁ sālavanasmiṁ senako, pāpakammamakari asabbhirūpaṁ. Ābādhoyaṁ asabbhirūpo.
anya-e0803n7:88_4: Tattha ālapanavacane diṭṭheyeva paccattavacanaṁ pāḷiyaṁ sarūpato anāgatampi diṭṭhameva hoti.
anya-e0803n7:88_5: Tathā karaṇavacane diṭṭheyeva nissakkavacanampi diṭṭhameva hoti.
anya-e0803n7:88_6: Samāse saddarūpe diṭṭheyeva byāse saddarūpaṁ yathāsambhavaṁ diṭṭhameva hoti ṭhapetvā ‘‘hetusatthāradassana’’ntiādīni. Tattha ca nibbānavācako ce,
anya-e0803n7:88_9: Sabbesamikārantitthiliṅgānaṁ sādhāraṇo hi so nayo. Sundaratthavācako ce,
anya-e0803n7:88_11: ‘‘Sabbhidhammabhūtaṁ nibbāna’’nti ettha hi sundaradhammabhūtaṁ nibbānanti attho.
anya-e0803n7:88_12: Evaṁ pāḷinayavasena ālapanādīsu pañcasu ṭhānesu sabbhisaddassa pavattiṁ ñatvā puna aṭṭhakathānayavasenapi tappavatti veditabbā. Kathaṁ?
anya-e0803n7:88_13: Yasmā sagāthāvaggassa aṭṭhakathāyaṁ ‘‘santo ‘sabbhīhi saddhiṁ sataṁ dhammo na jaraṁ upetī’ti pavedayantī’’ti imasmiṁ padese ‘‘sabbhīhī’’ti hivacanavasena saddaracanāviseso aṭṭhakathācariyehi dassito,
anya-e0803n7:88_14: tasmā sabbhisaddo sabbesupi vibhattivacanesu yojetabbo. Atridaṁ vadāma –
anya-e0803n7:90_0: Yato tato sabbhisaddaṁ, dhīro sabbattha yojaye.
anya-e0803n7:92_0: Yasmā tasmā sabbhisaddaṁ, viññū sabbadhi yojaye.
anya-e0803n7:93_1: asabbhā ca nivāraye’’ti ettha pana ‘‘asabbhā’’tipadaṁ vicitravuttīsu taddhitapaccayesu ṇyapaccayavasena nipphattimupāgatanti veditabbaṁ. Kathaṁ?
anya-e0803n7:93_2: Yebhuyyena asabbhīsu bhavaṁ asabbhaṁ. Kiṁ taṁ? Akusalaṁ,
anya-e0803n7:93_5: ‘‘Amhe asabbhāhi vācāhi vikkosamānā tibbāhi sattīhi hanissantī’’ti ettha tu asabbhīnaṁ etāti asabbhā,
anya-e0803n7:93_6: na vā sabbhīnaṁ etātipi asabbhāti nibbacanaṁ,
anya-e0803n7:93_8: Yā ca panettha amhehi santasaddassa ‘‘saṁ, santo. Saṁ, santaṁ,
anya-e0803n7:93_10: tattha ‘‘sameti asatā asa’’nti pāḷiyaṁ ‘‘asa’’nti pade diṭṭheyeva ‘‘sa’’nti padaṁ pāḷiyaṁ anāgatampi diṭṭhameva hoti yugaḷabhāvena vijjamānatārahattā.
anya-e0803n7:93_12: Atha vā ‘‘asa’’nti ettha na saṁ asanti samāsaviggahavasenādhigantabbattā ‘‘sa’’miti padaṁ diṭṭhameva hoti. Evamaññatrāpi nayo. Tatra santi sappuriso. Asanti asappuriso. Itthiliṅgevattabbe ‘‘asatī, asā’’ti rūpāni bhavanti. ‘‘Asatī, asatī, asatiyo, asā. Asatiṁ, asatī, asatiyo. Asāya, asatiyā, asatīhi, asatībhi. Asatiyā,
anya-e0803n7:94_0: Ettha pana ‘‘asā lokitthiyo nāma, velā tāsaṁ na vijjati.
anya-e0803n7:94_1: Mā ca vasaṁ asatīnaṁ nigacche’’tiādīni dassetabbāni.
anya-e0803n7:94_5: atha vā sātaṁ vuccati sukhaṁ, taṁ tāsu natthi,
anya-e0803n7:94_6: attani paṭibaddhacittānaṁ asātameva dentītipi asā , dukkhā,
anya-e0803n7:94_8: tasmā sātaṁ natthi etissanti asāti atthe ‘‘asā’’ti padassa yathā ritto assādo etthāti rittassantipadassa luttuttarakkharassa ‘‘rittassaṁ, rittassāni.
anya-e0803n7:94_9: Rittassa’’nti cittanayena nāmikapadamālā yojetabbā, tathā ‘‘asā, asā, asāyo. Asaṁ, asā, asāyo.
anya-e0803n7:95_0: Ettha ca yo amhehi ‘‘santo’’iti saddo dassito.
anya-e0803n7:96_0: Santo, santo, santā. Santaṁ, sante. Satā, santena, santehi, santebhi. Sato, santassa, sataṁ, santānaṁ. Satā, santā, santasmā, santamhā, santehi, santebhi. Sato, santassa, sataṁ, santānaṁ. Sati, sante, santasmiṁ, santamhi, santesu. Bho santa, bhavanto santo, bhavanto santā.
anya-e0803n7:97_0: Ettha pana ‘‘ayaṁ kho bhikkhave aṭṭhamo bhaddo assājānīyo santo saṁvijjamāno lokasmiṁ.
anya-e0803n7:97_1: Cattārome bhikkhave puggalā santo saṁvijjamānā lokasmiṁ.
anya-e0803n7:97_3: Bhave kho sati jāti hoti’’iccevamādīni payogāni bhavanti.
anya-e0803n7:97_4: ‘‘Saṅkhāresu kho sati viññāṇaṁ hotī’’tiādīsu pana satisaddo vacanavipallāsavasena ṭhitoti gahetabbo.
anya-e0803n7:98_0: Tatra ekavacanabahuvacanavasena dvidhā ṭhitesu santosaddesu bahuvacanasantosaddaṁ ṭhapetvā sesā samānasaddassatthampi vadanti, tasmā ‘‘santoti samāno,
anya-e0803n7:98_2: Samānoti imassa ca ‘‘honto’’ti attho ‘‘pahu samāno vipulatthacintī,
anya-e0803n7:98_3: kiṁ kāraṇā me na karosi dukkha’’ntiādīsu viya. Payogāni pana –
anya-e0803n7:100_0: Pahu santo na bharati, taṁ parābhavato mukhaṁ.
anya-e0803n7:102_0: Punarāyu ca me laddho, evaṁ jānāhi mārisā’’ti
anya-e0803n7:104_0: Apica santosaddo yasmā ‘‘kilanto’’ti ca ‘‘upasanto’’ti ca ‘‘niruddho’’ti ca atthaṁ vadati,
anya-e0803n7:104_1: tasmā tesaṁ vasena santasaddassa ‘‘santo, santā. Santaṁ, sante.
anya-e0803n7:104_2: Santenā’’ti purisanayena nāmikapadamālā veditabbā. Ettha ca ‘‘santo tasito. Dīghaṁ santassa yojanaṁ.
anya-e0803n7:104_7: Sā ca ‘‘saṁvijjamānaṁ samānaṁ kilantaṁ upasantaṁ niruddha’’miti atthadīpakāpadavatīti veditabbā.
anya-e0803n7:104_8: Atha vā ‘‘upādāne kho sati bhavo hotī’’tiādīsu napuṁsakappayogadassanato santasaddassa saṁvijjamānasaddatthavācakatte tatiyāpañcamīcatutthīchaṭṭhīsattamīṭhāne ‘‘satā, sato, sataṁ,
anya-e0803n7:104_9: satī’’ti padāni adhikāni vattabbāni, sesāni cittanayena ñeyyāni.
anya-e0803n7:104_10: Itthiliṅge pana vattabbe ‘‘santā, santā, santāyo. Santaṁ, santā, santāyo. Santāyā’’ti kaññānayena ca, santī, santī, santiyo . Santiṁ, santī, santiyo.
anya-e0803n7:104_12: Etāsu paṭhamā ‘‘saṁvijjamānā kilantā upasantā niruddhā’’ti atthadīpakāpadavatī, ettha payogā suviññeyyāva.
anya-e0803n7:104_14: Tathā hi ‘‘santī āpatti āvikātabbā’’ti ettha saṁvijjamānā ‘‘santī’’ti vuccati.
anya-e0803n7:109_2: Santīsaddassa hi saṁvijjamānasaddatthavācakatte ‘‘jātiyā kho sati jarāmaraṇaṁ hotī’’tiādinā itthiliṅgappayogadassanato sattamīṭhāne ‘‘sati, satiyā, satiyaṁ, santiyā, santiyaṁ,
anya-e0803n7:109_3: santīsū’’ti rūpāni vattabbāni. Sesāni itthinayena ñeyyāni. Ayaṁ tatiyā,
anya-e0803n7:109_4: ettha ca ‘‘asantiyā āpattiyā tuṇhī bhavitabba’’nti pāḷi ‘‘santiyā’’iccādīnaṁ atthibhāve nidassanaṁ.
anya-e0803n7:109_5: Aparo nayo – satīsaddassa ‘‘samānā’’ti imasmiṁ atthe ‘‘yā tvaṁ vasasi jiṇṇassa,
anya-e0803n7:109_6: evaṁ dahariyā satī’’ti ca ‘‘ye taṁ jiṇṇassa pādaṁsu,
anya-e0803n7:109_7: evaṁ dahariyaṁ sati’’nti ca pāḷidassanato ‘‘satī, satī, satiyo. Satiṁ, satī, satiyo.
anya-e0803n7:109_8: Satiyā’’tiādīnipi rūpāni yojetabbāni, saṁyoge nakāralopavasena vā.
anya-e0803n7:110_1: santā’’ti padadvayassa payoganicchayaṁ kathayāma payogesu sotūnaṁ asammūḷhabhāvāya.
anya-e0803n7:110_2: Tathā hi ‘‘sappurisā’’ti vā ‘‘paṇḍitā’’ti vā bahuvacanavasena atthaṁ vattukāmena ‘‘santo danto’’ti evaṁ vuttaekavacanasadisaṁ ‘‘santo’’ti bahuvacanaṁ vattabbaṁ.
anya-e0803n7:110_5: ‘‘santo saṁvijjamānā’’ti ca evaṁ vuttabahuvacanasadisaṁ ‘‘santo’’ti vā ‘‘santā’’ti vā bahuvacanaṁ vattabbaṁ,
anya-e0803n7:110_6: ‘‘kilanto’’ti vā ‘‘samāno’’ti vā ‘‘upasanto’’ti vā ‘‘niruddho’’ti vā ekavacanavasena atthaṁ vattukāmena ‘‘santo sappurisā’’ti evaṁ vuttabahuvacanasadisaṁ ‘‘santo’’ti ekavacanaṁ vattabbaṁ.
anya-e0803n7:110_7: Teyevatthe bahuvacanavasena vattukāmena pana ‘‘santā sūnehi pādehi,
anya-e0803n7:110_8: ko ne hatthe gahessatī’’ti ettha viya ‘‘santā’’ti bahuvacanaṁ vattabbaṁ.
anya-e0803n7:114_0: Mahaṁ, mahā, mahanto, mahantā. Mahantaṁ, mahante. Mahatā, mahantena, mahantehi, mahantebhi. Mahato, mahantassa, mahantānaṁ, mahataṁ. Mahatā, mahantā, mahantasmā, mahantamhā, mahantehi, mahantebhi. Mahato, mahantassa, mahantānaṁ, mahataṁ. Mahati, mahante, mahantasmiṁ, mahantamhi, mahantesu. Bho maha, bho mahā,
anya-e0803n7:115_5: Itthiliṅge vattabbe ‘‘mahatī, mahatī, mahatiyo. Mahatiṁ, mahatī, mahatiyo. Mahatiyā,
anya-e0803n7:115_7: ‘‘Mahatiyā ca yakkhasenāyā’’tiādīnettha nidassanapadāni. Aparopi ‘‘mahantā, mahantā, mahantāyo.
anya-e0803n7:116_1: carantī’’tiādīni ca ‘‘iddhimantī’’ti ca padaṁ dissati, tasmā ‘‘mahantī,
anya-e0803n7:116_3: Na bhavitabbaṁ tathārūpassa nayassa vasena aggahetabbattā, ‘‘mahatī,
anya-e0803n7:116_5: Tathā hi pāḷiyaṁ aṭṭhakathāsu ca ‘‘seyyathāpi nāma mahatī naṅgalasīsā, itthī siyā rūpavatī, sā ca sīlavatī siyā. Satimatī cakkhumatī.
anya-e0803n7:116_6: Iddhimatī pattimatī’’ti ca ‘‘mahatiṁ senaṁ disvā mahosadhasenā mandā,
anya-e0803n7:116_7: ayaṁ ativiya mahatī senā dissatī’’ti ca ādīni payogāni dissanti, na ‘‘mahantī, rūpavantī’’iccādīni.
anya-e0803n7:117_0: Keci pana ‘‘mahāiti saddo byāse na labbhati,
anya-e0803n7:117_1: samāseyeva labbhati ‘mahāpuriso’ti ettha viyā’’ti vadanti, taṁ na gahetabbaṁ. ‘‘Mahā te upāsaka pariccāgo.
anya-e0803n7:117_2: Mahā vatāyaṁ bhante bhūmicālo. Ghoso ca vipulo mahā. Bārāṇasirajjaṁ nāma mahā.
anya-e0803n7:117_4: Evaṁ byāsepi labbhatīti veditabbaṁ, tasmā ‘‘mahaṁ, mahā, mahanto, mahantā. Bho mahanta,
anya-e0803n7:117_5: bhavanto mahantā’’ti pulliṅge, ‘‘mahantaṁ, mahā, mahantāni. Bho mahanta,
anya-e0803n7:117_6: bhavanto mahantānī’’ti napuṁsakaliṅge, ‘‘mahantā, mahā, mahantā, mahantāyo. Bhoti mahante, bhotiyo mahantā,
anya-e0803n7:117_8: Samāse pana ‘‘mahāsatto mahāupāsako mahāupāsikā mahabbalo mahāvanaṁ mahaggataṁ mahapphalaṁ mahabbhaya’’ntiādīni rūpāni bhavanti,
anya-e0803n7:117_9: taddhite ‘‘mahattano mahattaṁ mahantattaṁ mahantatā’’ti rūpāni bhavanti.
anya-e0803n7:117_10: Gacchantasaddassa pana ‘‘gacchanto gacchantā’’ti rūpāni vatvā sesāni mahantasadde vuttanayena vitthāretvā nāmikapadamālā veditabbā. Tathā ‘‘gacchanto,
anya-e0803n7:117_15: dadaṁ dadanto dadantaṁ dadantī’’tiādīnaṁ anekapadasahassānaṁ nāmikapadamālā vitthāretabbā.
anya-e0803n7:118_1: te samamhehi payogo sāsane na diṭṭho nayavasenāgahetabbattā. Tasmā tāni ettha na vadāma. Ayaṁ pana viseso diṭṭho. Seyyathidaṁ?
anya-e0803n7:125_0: Adhammaṁ sārathi kayirā, mañce tvaṁ nikkhanaṁ vane’’;
anya-e0803n7:131_1: passa’’ntiādīnaṁ liṅgavibhattivacanantaravasena yo viseso dissati, taṁ vadāma.
anya-e0803n7:131_2: Tathā hi ‘‘sā jānaṁyeva āha na jānāmīti,
anya-e0803n7:131_3: passaṁyeva āha na passāmī’’ti evamādīsu jānaṁ passaṁ saddānaṁ ‘‘jānantī passantī’’ti liṅgantaravasena parivattanaṁ bhavatīti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0803n7:131_4: Iminā ‘‘gacchaṁ’’iti saddassapi yathāpayogaṁ ‘‘gacchantī’’ti itthiyā kathanattho labbhati tehi samānagatikattā,
anya-e0803n7:131_5: na ‘‘gacchanto’’ti saddassa ‘‘gacchantī’’ti itthiyā kathanattho labbhati tehi asamānagatikattāti kāraṇaṁ dassitaṁ hoti.
anya-e0803n7:131_6: ‘‘Api nu tumhe āyasmanto ekantasukhaṁ lokaṁ jānaṁ passaṁ viharathā’’ti ettha ‘‘jānantā passantā’’ti vacanantaravasena parivattanaṁ bhavatīti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0803n7:131_7: Iminā pana ‘‘gacchaṁ’’iti saddassapi yathāpayogaṁ ‘‘gacchantā’’ti bahuvacanattho labbhati tehi samānagatikattā,
anya-e0803n7:131_8: na ‘‘gacchante’’ti saddassa ‘‘gacchantā’’ti bahuvacanattho labbhati tehi asamānagatikattāti kāraṇaṁ dassitaṁ hoti. Esa nayo uttaratrāpi. ‘‘Bharanti mātāpitaro,
anya-e0803n7:131_9: pubbe katamanussara’’nti ettha anussaraṁsaddassa ‘‘anussarantā’’ti vacanantaravasena parivattanaṁ bhavati. ‘‘Saddhammo garukātabbo,
anya-e0803n7:131_10: saraṁ buddhāna sāsana’’nti ettha saraṁsaddassa sarantenāti vibhattantaravasena parivattanaṁ bhavati. ‘‘Phusaṁ bhūtāni saṇṭhānaṁ,
anya-e0803n7:131_11: manasā gaṇhato yathā’’ti ettha phusaṁsaddassapi ‘‘phusantassā’’ti vibhattantaravasena parivattanaṁ bhavati.
anya-e0803n7:131_12: Tathā ‘‘yācaṁ adadamappiyo’’ti etthāpi yācaṁsaddassa ‘‘yācantassā’’ti vibhattantaravasena parivattanaṁ bhavati.
anya-e0803n7:131_17: passa’’ntiādīnaṁ liṅgavibhattivacanantaravasena katthaci parivattananti ayaṁ tividhopi ākāro ākhyātikapadatthavibhāvanāya saddhiṁ kathito pāvacanavare sotūnaṁ saddesvatthesu ca visāradabuddhipaṭilābhatthaṁ.
anya-e0803n7:132_0: ‘‘Bhavaṁ karaṁ arahaṁ saṁ, mahaṁ’’iti padāni tu;
anya-e0803n7:134_0: ‘‘Gacchaṁ caraṁ dadaṁ tiṭṭhaṁ, cintayaṁ bhāvayaṁ vadaṁ;
anya-e0803n7:138_1: yadidaṁ dvīsu liṅgesu chasu vibhattīsu terasasu vacanesu aññataraliṅgavibhattivacanavasena parivattanaṁ.
anya-e0803n7:147_0: Idāni dhanabhūtiiccetassa pakatirūpassa aññesañca taṁsadisānaṁ nāmikapadamālāvibhāgaṁ vakkhāmi pubbācariyamataṁ purecaraṁ katvā.
anya-e0803n7:148_0: Aggi, aggī, aggayo. Aggiṁ, aggī, aggayo. Agginā, aggīhi, aggībhi. Aggissa, aggino, aggīnaṁ. Agginā, aggīhi, aggībhi. Aggissa, aggino, aggīnaṁ. Aggismiṁ, aggimhi, aggīsu. Bho aggi, bho aggī, bhavanto aggayo. Yamakamahātheramataṁ.
anya-e0803n7:149_0: Ettha kiñcāpi nissakkavacanaṭṭhāne ‘‘aggismā, aggimhā’’ti imāni nāgatāni,
anya-e0803n7:149_1: tathāpi tattha tattha taṁsadisappayogadassanato gahetabbāni. ‘‘Agginā, aggismā,
anya-e0803n7:150_0: Dhanabhūti, dhanabhūtī, dhanabhūtayo. Dhanabhūtiṁ, dhanabhūtī, dhanabhūtayo. Dhanabhūtinā, dhanabhūtīhi, dhanabhūtībhi. Dhanabhūtissa, dhanabhūtino, dhanabhūtīnaṁ. Dhanabhūtinā, dhanabhūtismā, dhanabhūtimhā, dhanabhūtīhi, dhanabhūtībhi. Dhanabhūtissa, dhanabhūtino, dhanabhūtīnaṁ. Dhanabhūtismiṁ, dhanabhūtimhi, dhanabhūtīsu. Bho dhanabhūti, bho dhanabhūtī, bhavanto dhanabhūtayo.
anya-e0803n7:152_0: Gini joti dadhi pāṇi, isi sandhi muni maṇi.
anya-e0803n7:153_0: Byādhi gaṇṭhi ravi muṭṭhi, kavi giri kapi nidhi;
anya-e0803n7:154_0: Kucchi vatthi vidhi sāli, vīhi rāsi ahi masi.
anya-e0803n7:155_0: Sāti kesi kimi bondi, bodhi dīpi pati hari;
anya-e0803n7:156_0: Ari dhani timi kali, sārathyudadhi añjali,
anya-e0803n7:159_0: Atha vā etesu adhipatisaddassa ‘‘adhipatiyā sattā’’ti pāḷidassanato ‘‘adhipatiyā’’ti sattamīrūpampi icchitabbaṁ.
anya-e0803n7:159_1: Apica ‘‘asāre sāramatino’’ti pāḷiyaṁ ikārantasamāsapadato yovacanassa noādesadassanato kvaci adhipatiiccādīnaṁ ikārantasamāsapadānaṁ ‘‘adhipatino’’tiādināpi paccattopayogarūpāni icchitabbāni īkārantānaṁ daṇḍīsaddādīnaṁ ‘‘daṇḍino’’tiādīni paccattopayogasampadānasāmivacanarūpāni viya.
anya-e0803n7:159_2: Gahapatijānipatisaddādīnaṁ pana samāsapadānampi evarūpāni paccattopayogarūpāni na icchitabbāni ‘‘gahapatayo jānipatayo’’tiādinā nayena yathāpāvacanaṁ gahetabbarūpattā.
anya-e0803n7:160_0: Ye panettha amhehi aggini ginisaddā vuttā,
anya-e0803n7:160_8: sabbāsupi vibhattīsu dvīsu vacanesu yojetabbatādassanato ca.
anya-e0803n7:165_1: Tenāha aṭṭhakathācariyo ‘‘agginiṁ sampajjalitanti samantatojālaṁ sabbadisāsu ca sampajjalitamaggi’’nti.
anya-e0803n7:170_0: Imasmiṁ padese samāsavisayattā agginisañjalitanti agginīhi sañjalitanti attho labbhati,
anya-e0803n7:171_2: yasmā so jāyate ginī’’ti cūḷabodhicariyāyaṁ ginisaddo diṭṭho.
anya-e0803n7:171_3: Keci panettha sandhivasena akāralopaṁ saññogādissa ca gakārassa lopaṁ vadanti,
anya-e0803n7:171_4: tampi na yujjati tassā pāḷiyā aṭṭhakathāyaṁ ‘‘yasmāti yato kaṭṭhā.
anya-e0803n7:171_5: Ginīti aggī’’ti evaṁ ginisaddassa ulliṅgetvā vacanato.
anya-e0803n7:171_6: Tathā ‘‘channā kuṭi āhito ginī’’ti imassa dhaniyasuttassa aṭṭhakathāyaṁ ‘‘āhitoti ābhato jālito vā. Ginīti aggī’’ti vacanato,
anya-e0803n7:171_8: anāhāropasammatī’’ti imissā theragāthāya saṁvaṇṇanāyaṁ ‘‘ginīti aggī’’ti vacanato.
anya-e0803n7:171_9: Yadi hi ginisaddo visuṁ na siyā,
anya-e0803n7:171_10: aṭṭhakathācariyā ‘‘jāyate ginī’’tiādīni ‘‘jāyate agginī’’tiādinā padacchedavasena atthaṁ vadeyyuṁ. Yasmā evaṁ na vadiṁsu,
anya-e0803n7:171_14: tesaṁ vacanaṁ na gahetabbameva sāsane ginisaddassupalabbhanato.
anya-e0803n7:171_15: Suttanipātaṭṭhakathāyañhi ‘‘channā kuṭi āhito ginī’’ti pāṭhassa saṁvaṇṇanāyameva ‘‘tesu ṭhānesu aggini ‘ginī’ti vohariyatī’’ti tassa abhidhānantaraṁ vuttaṁ,
anya-e0803n7:175_0: Tamhi ṭhāne manussānaṁ, bhāsā eva giniccayaṁ.
anya-e0803n7:178_0: Iti alābu lābusaddā viya aggini ginisaddāpi bhagavato pācane dissantīti veditabbā.
anya-e0803n7:178_1: Yathā pana agginisaddassa sabbāsu vibhattīsu dvīsu vacanesu yojetabbatā siddhā,
anya-e0803n7:179_0: Aggini , agginī, agginayo. Agginiṁ, agginī, agginayo. Aggininā, agginīhi, agginībhi. Agginissa, agginīnaṁ. Aggininā, agginismā, agginimhā, agginīhi, agginībhi. Agginissa, agginīnaṁ. Agginismiṁ, agginimhi, agginīsu. Bho aggini, bhavanto agginī, bhavanto agginayo.
anya-e0803n7:180_0: ‘‘Gini, ginī, ginayo. Giniṁ, ginī, ginayo, gininā’’ti sabbaṁ yojetabbaṁ.
anya-e0803n7:180_1: Iti pāḷinayānusārena aggini ginisaddānaṁ nāmikapadamālā yojitā.
anya-e0803n7:180_2: Atha vā yathā sakkaṭabhāsāyaṁ satva paddhasvāminīti saññogavasena vuttānaṁ saddānaṁ māgadhabhāsaṁ patvā sattavapadumasuvāminīti nissaññogavasena uccāritā pāḷi dissati ‘‘tvañca uttamasattavo’’tiādinā,
anya-e0803n7:180_3: tathā sakkaṭabhāsāyaṁ agnīti saññogavasena vuttassa māgadhabhāsaṁ patvā ‘‘agginī’’ti saññoganakāravasena uccāritā pāḷi dissati ‘‘agginiṁ sampajjalitaṁ pavisantī’’tiādikā.
anya-e0803n7:180_4: Yathā ca veyyākaraṇehi sakkaṭabhāsābhūto agnisaddo sabbāsu vibhattīsu tīsu vacanesu yojiyati,
anya-e0803n7:180_5: tathā māgadhabhāsābhūto agginisaddopi sabbāsu vibhattīsu dvīsu vacanesu yojetabbova hoti, tasmā so idhamhehi yojiyati,
anya-e0803n7:181_0: Ettha siyā – yadi agginisaddo sabbesu vibhattivacanesu yojetabbo,
anya-e0803n7:181_1: atha kasmā kaccāyane ‘‘aggissinī’’ti lakkhaṇena simhi pare aggisaddantassa iniādeso dassitoti? Saccaṁ,
anya-e0803n7:181_2: yathā navakkhattuṁ ṭhapetvā katekasesassa dasasaddassa yovacanamhi navādesaṁ katvā yovacanassa utiādesaṁ kasmā ‘‘navutī’’ti rūpe nipphanne puna ‘‘navutī’’ti pakatiṁ ṭhapetvā tato naṁvacanaṁ katvā ‘‘navutīna’’nti rūpaṁ nipphāditaṁ .
anya-e0803n7:181_3: Itthiliṅge pana nādiekavacanāni katvā tesaṁ yāādesaṁ katvā ‘‘navutiyā’’ti rūpaṁ nipphāditaṁ.
anya-e0803n7:181_4: Tathā hi ‘‘channavutīnaṁ pāsaṇḍānaṁ dhammānaṁ pavaraṁ yadidaṁ sugatavinayaṁ navutiyā haṁsasahassehi parivuto’’tiādīni payogāni dissanti.
anya-e0803n7:181_5: Tathā simhi aggisaddantassa iniādesakaraṇavasena ‘‘agginī’’ti rūpe nipphannepi puna ‘‘agginī’’ti pakatiṁ ṭhapetvā tato yoaṁnādayo vibhattiyo katvā ‘‘aggini, agginī, agginayo. Agginiṁ, agginī, agginayo.
anya-e0803n7:181_6: Aggininā’’tiādīni kathaṁ na nipphajjissantīti sanniṭṭhānaṁ kātabbaṁ.
anya-e0803n7:184_0: Idāni bhāvī iccetassa pakatirūpassa aññesañca taṁsadisānaṁ nāmikapadamālāvibhāgaṁ vakkhāma pubbācariyamataṁ purecaraṁ katvā.
anya-e0803n7:185_0: Daṇḍī, daṇḍī, daṇḍino. Daṇḍiṁ, daṇḍī, daṇḍino. Daṇḍinā, daṇḍīhi, daṇḍībhi. Daṇḍissa, daṇḍino, daṇḍīnaṁ. Daṇḍinā, daṇḍīhi, daṇḍībhi. Daṇḍissa, daṇḍino, daṇḍīnaṁ. Daṇḍismiṁ, daṇḍimhi, daṇḍīsu. Bho daṇḍi, bho daṇḍī, bhavanto daṇḍino. Yamakamahātheramataṁ.
anya-e0803n7:186_2: tathāpi tattha tattha taṁsadisassa payogassa dassanato gahetabbameva.
anya-e0803n7:188_0: Santi hi daharā pakkhī, paññavanto jutindharā’’ti
anya-e0803n7:189_0: Pāḷiyaṁ ‘‘pakkhī’’iti paccattabahuvacanassa dassanato pana ‘‘daṇḍī’’iti paccattopayogabahuvacanāni vuttānīti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0803n7:190_0: Bhāvī, bhāvī, bhāvino. Bhāviṁ, bhāvinaṁ, bhāvī, bhāvino. Bhāvinā, bhāvīhi, bhāvībhi. Bhāvissa, bhāvino, bhāvīnaṁ. Bhāvinā, bhāvismā, bhāvimhā, bhāvīhi, bhāvībhi. Bhāvissa, bhāvino, bhāvīnaṁ. (Bhāvini) bhāvismiṁ, bhāvimhi, bhāvīsu. Bho bhāvi, bho bhāvī, bhavanto bhāvino.
anya-e0803n7:191_0: Evaṁ vibhāvī sambhāvī, paribhāvī dhajī gaṇī;
anya-e0803n7:192_0: Sukhī rogī sasī kuṭṭhī, makuṭī kusalī balī.
anya-e0803n7:193_0: Jaṭī yogī karī yānī, tomarī musalī phalī;
anya-e0803n7:194_0: Dantī mantī sudhī medhī, bhāgī bhogī nakhī sikhī.
anya-e0803n7:195_0: Dhammī saṅghī ñāṇī atthī, hatthī cakkhī pakkhī dāṭhī;
anya-e0803n7:196_0: Raṭṭhī chattī mālī cammī, cārī cāgī kāmī sāmī.
anya-e0803n7:199_0: Vajjadassī ca pāṇī ca, yasassiccādayopi ca;
anya-e0803n7:200_0: Etesaṁ koci bhedo tu, ekadesena vuccate.
anya-e0803n7:203_0: Evaṁ jarā ca maccu ca, adhivattanti pāṇine.
anya-e0803n7:206_0: Ucchinno saha raṭṭhena, majjhāraññaṁ tadā ahu.
anya-e0803n7:208_1: ayaṁ nayo daṇḍīpadādīsupi labbhateva samānagatikattā daṇḍīpadādīnaṁ vajjadassīpadādīhi.
anya-e0803n7:208_2: Tasmā upayogaṭṭhāne ‘‘daṇḍiṁ, daṇḍinaṁ, daṇḍino, daṇḍine’’ti yojetabbaṁ. Bhummaṭṭhāne ‘‘daṇḍismiṁ, daṇḍimhi, daṇḍini, daṇḍine, daṇḍīsu, daṇḍinesū’’ti yojetabbaṁ.
anya-e0803n7:208_3: Esa nayo gāmaṇī senānīiccādīni vajjetvā yathārahaṁ īkārantapulliṅgesu netabbo.
anya-e0803n7:211_0: Idāni bhūdhātumayānaṁ ukārantapulliṅgānaṁ appasiddhattā aññesaṁ ukārantapulliṅgānaṁ vasena pakatirūpassa nāmikapadamālaṁ pūressāma. Katamāni tāni?
anya-e0803n7:211_1: ‘‘Bhikkhu hetu setu ketu rāhu bhāṇu khāṇu saṅku ucchu veḷu maccu jantu sindhu bandhu ruru neru sattu babbu paṭu bindu garu’’iccādīni.
anya-e0803n7:212_0: Bhikkhu, bhikkhū, bhikkhavo. Bhikkhuṁ, bhikkhū, bhikkhavo. Bhikkhunā, bhikkhūhi, bhikkhūbhi. Bhikkhussa, bhikkhuno, bhikkhūnaṁ. Bhikkhunā, bhikkhusmā, bhikkhumhā, bhikkhūhi, bhikkhūbhi. Bhikkhussa, bhikkhuno, bhikkhūnaṁ. Bhikkhusmiṁ, bhikkhumhi, bhikkhūsu. Bho bhikkhu, bhavanto bhikkhū, bhikkhave, bhikkhavo.
anya-e0803n7:212_1: Bhikkhuādīni aññāni ca taṁsadisāni evaṁ ñeyyāni.
anya-e0803n7:213_0: Ayampi panettha viseso ñeyyo – hetu, hetū, hetuyo, hetavo. Hetuṁ, hetū, hetuyo, hetavo. Bho hetu, bhavanto hetū, hetave, hetavo. Sesaṁ bhikkhusamaṁ.
anya-e0803n7:214_0: Atha vā ‘‘hetuyā’’tiādīnaṁ dassanato ‘‘dhenuyā’’ti itthiliṅgarūpena sadisaṁ ‘‘hetuyā’’ti pulliṅgarūpampi sattamīṭhāne icchitabbaṁ.
anya-e0803n7:214_1: Kānici hi pulliṅgarūpāni kehici itthiliṅgarūpehi sadisāni bhavanti. Taṁ yathā? ‘‘Uṭṭhehi katte taramāno. Ehi bālekhamāpehi, kusarājaṁ mahabbalaṁ.
anya-e0803n7:214_2: Bhātarā mātarā adhipatiyā rattiyā hetuyo dhenuyo matyā petyā’’ti evaṁ nayadassanena ‘‘hetuyā tīṇi. Adhipatiyā satta.
anya-e0803n7:215_0: Jantu, jantū, jantuyo, jantuno, jantavo. Jantuṁ, jantū, jantuyo, jantuno, jantavo. Bho jantu, bhavanto jantū, jantave jantavo. Sesaṁ bhikkhusamaṁ.
anya-e0803n7:216_0: Garu, garū, garavo, garuno. Garuṁ, garū, garavo, garuno. Bho garu, bhavanto garū, garavo, garuno. Sesaṁ bhikkhusamaṁ.
anya-e0803n7:216_3: Tatra ‘‘bhikkhave’’ti āmantanapadaṁ cuṇṇiyapadesveva dissati, na gāthāsu.
anya-e0803n7:216_5: apica ‘‘bhikkhave’’ti āmantanapadaṁ sāvakassa bhikkhūnaṁ āmantanapāḷiyaṁ sandhivisayeyeva dissati, na asandhivisaye,
anya-e0803n7:216_6: buddhassa pana bhikkhūnaṁ āmantanapāḷiyaṁ sandhivisayepi asandhivisayepi dissati.
anya-e0803n7:216_7: ‘‘Bhikkhavo’’ti āmantanapadaṁ buddhassa bhikkhūnaṁ āmantanapāḷiyaṁ gāthāsu ca dissati ,
anya-e0803n7:216_9: Sāvakassa pana bhikkhūnaṁ āmantanapāḷiyaṁ na dissatīti ayaṁ dvinnaṁ viseso daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0803n7:216_10: Tathā hi ‘‘evañca pana bhikkhave imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyāthā’’tiādīsu ‘‘bhikkhave’’ti padaṁ cuṇṇiyapadesveva diṭṭhaṁ. ‘‘Bhikkhavo tisatā ime,
anya-e0803n7:216_12: ‘‘Āyasmā sāriputto bhikkhū āmantesi āvuso bhikkhave’’ti evamādīsu sāvakassa bhikkhūnaṁ āmantanapāḷīsu sandhivisayeyeva ‘‘bhikkhave’’ti padaṁ diṭṭhaṁ.
anya-e0803n7:216_13: ‘‘Bhikkhū āmantesi sotukāmattha bhikkhave’’ti ‘‘idha bhikkhave bhikkhū’’tiādīsu pana buddhassa bhikkhūnaṁ āmantanapāḷīsu sandhivisayāvisayesu ‘‘bhikkhave’’ti padaṁ diṭṭhaṁ. ‘‘Araññe rukkhamūle vā,
anya-e0803n7:216_14: suññāgāreva bhikkhavo’’ti ‘‘tatra kho bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesi bhikkhavo’’ti evamādīsu buddhassa bhikkhūnaṁ āmantanapāḷīsu ‘‘bhikkhavo’’ti āmantanapadaṁ gāthāsu ca diṭṭhaṁ,
anya-e0803n7:223_0: Idāni pana sayambhūiccetassa pakatirūpassa taṁsadisānañca nāmikapadamālaṁ kathayāma –
anya-e0803n7:224_0: Sayambhū , sayambhū, sayambhuvo. Sayambhuṁ, sayambhū, sayambhuvo. Sayambhunā, sayambhūhi, sayambhūbhi. Sayambhussa, sayambhuno, sayambhūnaṁ. Sayambhunā, sayambhusmā, sayambhumhā, sayambhūhi, sayambhūbhi. Sayambhussa, sayambhuno, sayambhūnaṁ. Sayambhusmiṁ, sayambhumhi, sayambhūsu. Bho sayambhu, bho sayambhū, bhavanto sayambhū, sayambhuvo.
anya-e0803n7:225_0: Sabbaññū, sabbaññū, sabbaññuno. Sabbaññuṁ, sabbaññū, sabbaññuno. Bho sabbaññu, bhavanto sabbaññū, sabbaññuno,
anya-e0803n7:225_2: evaṁ vidū viññū kataññū maggaññū dhammaññū atthaññū kālaññū rattaññū mattaññū vadaññū avadaññū iccādīni.
anya-e0803n7:226_1: vadaññū vītamaccharā’’ti ettha ‘‘vadaññū’’ti paccattabahuvacanassa dassanato sayambhū sabbaññū iccādīnampi paccattopayogabahuvacanattaṁ gahetabbaṁ. Apica ‘‘vidū,
anya-e0803n7:226_2: viññū’’tiādīsu ‘‘paracittavidunī’’ti itthiliṅgadassanato itthiliṅge vattabbe ‘‘vidunī, vidunī, viduniyo. Viduniṁ, vidunī, viduniyo.
anya-e0803n7:226_4: Tathā ‘‘viññū paṭibalā subhāsitadubbhāsitaṁ duṭṭhullāduṭṭhullaṁ ājānitu’’nti ettha ‘‘viññū’’ti itthiliṅgadassanato ‘‘kodhanā akataññū ca,
anya-e0803n7:226_5: pisuṇā mittabhedikā’’ti ettha ca ‘‘akataññū’’ti itthiliṅgadassanatopi ‘‘viññū, viññū, viññuyo. Viññuṁ, viññū, viññuyo. Viññuyā’’ti ca ‘‘kataññū, kataññū, kataññuyo. Kataññuṁ, kataññū, kataññuyo,
anya-e0803n7:226_6: kataññuyāti ca jambūnayena padamālā kātabbā. Evaṁ ‘‘maggaññū, dhammaññū’’iccādīsupi.
anya-e0803n7:226_7: ‘‘Sayambhū’’ti pade pana ‘‘sayambhu ñāṇaṁ gotrabhu citta’’nti dassanato napuṁsakaliṅgatte vattabbe ‘‘sayambhu, sayambhū, sayambhūni. Sayambhuṁ, sayambhū,
anya-e0803n7:231_0: Yasmā panāyaṁ samattopi pāvacanādīsu yaṁ yaṁ ṭhānaṁ sotūnaṁ sammuyhanaṭṭhānaṁ dissati,
anya-e0803n7:231_1: tattha tattha sotūnamanuggahāya codanāsodhanāvasena saṁsayaṁ samugghāṭetvā puna vattabbo hoti,
anya-e0803n7:232_1: apace brahmacārayo’’ti ca rūpaṁ ikārantassa aggisaddassa ‘‘aggayo’’ti rūpamiva vuttaṁ,
anya-e0803n7:232_2: taṁ tathā avatvā īkārantassa daṇḍīsaddassa ‘‘daṇḍino’’ti rūpamiva ‘‘brahmacārino’’icceva vattabbanti? Saccaṁ,
anya-e0803n7:232_3: tattha ‘‘brahmaṁ caratīti brahmacāri yathā munātīti munī’’ti evaṁ ikārantavasena icchitattā.
anya-e0803n7:232_6: yathā dukkaṭaṁ kammaṁ karaṇasīloti dukkaṭakammakārī’’ti evaṁ tassīlatthaṁ gahetvā īkārantavasena gahaṇe ‘‘dukkaṭakammakārino’’ti rūpamiva ‘‘daṇḍo assa atthīti daṇḍī’’ti īkārantassa saddassa ‘‘daṇḍino’’ti rūpamiva ca ‘‘brahmacārino’’ti rūpaṁ bhavati.
anya-e0803n7:232_7: Tathā hi ‘‘ime hi nāma dhammacārino samacārino brahmacārino saccavādino sīlavanto kalyāṇadhammā paṭijānissantī’’ti pāḷi dissati.
anya-e0803n7:232_9: puna īkārantavasena ‘‘brahmacārino’’ti paccattopayogālapanabahuvacanarūpampi yujjati, tasmā ‘‘brahmacāri, brahmacārī, brahmacārayo’’ti agginayena, ‘‘brahmacārī, brahmacārī,
anya-e0803n7:233_0: Yaṁ pana āyasmā buddhaghoso ‘‘yathā sobhanti yatino,
anya-e0803n7:233_1: sīlabhūsanabhūsitā’’ti ettha yatisaddassa ikārantassa aggisaddassa ‘‘aggayo’’ti rūpaṁ viya ‘‘yatayo’’ti rūpaṁ avatvā kasmā īkārantassa daṇḍīsaddassa ‘‘daṇḍino’’ti rūpaṁ viya ‘‘yatino’’ti rūpaṁ dasseti.
anya-e0803n7:233_3: Yathā hi ‘‘kukkuṭā maṇayo daṇḍā sivayo deva te kuddhā’’ti pāḷigatiyā upaparikkhiyamānāya ‘‘yatayo’’ti rūpeneva bhavitabbaṁ ikārantattāti? Nāyaṁ pamādalekhā.
anya-e0803n7:233_4: ‘‘Vadanasīlo vādī’’ti ettha viya tassīlatthaṁ gahetvā īkārantavasena yojane niddosattā,
anya-e0803n7:233_5: tasmā ‘‘yatanasīlo yatī’’ti evaṁ tassīlatthaṁ cetasi sannidhāya īkārantavasena ‘‘yatino’’ti sampadānasāmīnamekavacanasadisaṁ paccattabahuvacanarūpaṁ bhadantena buddhaghosena dassitanti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0803n7:234_0: Yattha pana tassīlatthaṁ aggahetvā ‘‘yo munāti ubho loke,
anya-e0803n7:234_1: muni tena pavuccatī’’ti ettha viya ‘‘yatati vīriyaṁ karotīti yatī’’ti kattukārakavasena ikārantabhāvo gayhati.
anya-e0803n7:234_2: Tattha ‘‘munayo maṇayo sivayo’’ti yokārantarūpāni viya ‘‘yatayo’’ti yokārantaṁ paccattabahuvacanarūpañca upayogālapanabahuvacanarūpañca bhavati,
anya-e0803n7:234_3: evaṁ īkārantapulliṅgānaṁ tīsu ṭhānesu yokārantāneva rūpāni bhavantīti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0803n7:235_0: Yadi evaṁ ikārantapulliṅgānaṁ sāramati suddhadiṭṭhisammādiṭṭhimicchādiṭṭhivajirabuddhi saddādī kathanti?
anya-e0803n7:235_1: Etesaṁ pana ikārantavasena niddiṭṭhānampi samāsapadattā agginaye aṭṭhatvā yathāsambhavaṁ daṇḍīnaye tiṭṭhanato nokārantāneva rūpāni.
anya-e0803n7:235_4: Nanu ca bho kaccāyanappakaraṇe ‘‘atthe visāradamatayo’’ti ettha samāsapadassa ikārantapulliṅgassa yokārantassa paccattabahuvacanapāṭhassa dassanato sāramatisaddādīnampi ‘‘visāradamatayo’’ti rūpena viya yokārantehi rūpehi bhavitabbanti?
anya-e0803n7:235_5: Napi bhavitabbaṁ buddhavacane samāsapadānaṁ ikārantapulliṅgānaṁ ‘‘visāradamatayo’’ti rūpasadisassa rūpassa adassanatoti.
anya-e0803n7:236_0: Nanu ca bho buddhavacane ‘‘pañcime gahapatayo ānisaṁsā. Te honti jānipatayo,
anya-e0803n7:236_1: aññamaññaṁ piyaṁvadā’’ti samāsapadānaṁ ikārantapulliṅgānaṁ ‘‘visāradamatayo’’ti rūpasadisāni yokārantāni rūpāni dissanti.
anya-e0803n7:236_2: Evaṁ sante kasmā ‘‘buddhavacane samāsapadānaṁ ikārantapulliṅgānaṁ ‘‘visāradamatayo’’ti rūpasadisassa yokārantassa rūpassa adassanato’’ti vuttanti?
anya-e0803n7:236_4: Gahapatisaddādīsu hi yasmā patisaddo sabhāveneva pulliṅgo,
anya-e0803n7:236_5: na tu samāsato pubbe itthiliṅgapakatiko hutvā pacchā pulliṅgabhāvaṁ patto,
anya-e0803n7:236_7: senāpatino’’ti yo nokārantāni ca paccattopayogālapanabahuvacanarūpāni bhavanti.
anya-e0803n7:236_9: Yasmā pana sāramati suddhadiṭṭhisammādiṭṭhi micchādiṭṭhi vajirabuddhi saddādīsu matidiṭṭhisaddādayo samāsato pubbe itthiliṅgapakatikā hutvā pacchā bahubbīhisamāsavasena pulliṅgabhāvappattā,
anya-e0803n7:236_10: tasmā īdisesu ṭhānesu ‘‘sāramatino suddhadiṭṭhino sammādiṭṭhino micchādiṭṭhino vajirabuddhino’’tiādīni’nokārantāniyeva paccattopayogālapanabahuvacanarūpāni bhavanti,
anya-e0803n7:237_1: Ettha pana ayaṁ viseso veditabbo – katthaci pāṭhe ‘‘seṭṭhī sārathī cakkavattī sāmī’’ti antakkharassa dīghattaṁ dissati,
anya-e0803n7:237_2: katthaci pana ‘‘seṭṭhi sārathi cakkavatti sāmi’’iti antakkharassa rassattaṁ dissati.
anya-e0803n7:237_4: tathāpi tattha tattha paccattavacanādibhāvena ‘‘seṭṭhino sārathino’’tiādipayogadassanato rassaṁ katvā etāni uccāriyantīti ñāyati,
anya-e0803n7:237_5: tasmā evaṁ nibbacanattho gahetabbo – seṭṭhaṁ dhanasāraṁ,
anya-e0803n7:237_8: Cakkaṁ pavattanasīloti cakkavattī. Saṁ etassa atthīti sāmīti.
anya-e0803n7:237_9: Assatthikatassīlatthasaddā hi nokārantarūpavasena samānagatikā bhavanti yathā ‘‘daṇḍino bhūmisāyino’’ti.
anya-e0803n7:237_10: Aparopi nibbacanattho īkārantavasena assadammādayo sāretīti sārathī.
anya-e0803n7:237_11: Tathā hi ‘‘purisadamme sāretīti purisadammasārathī’’ti vuttaṁ. Cakkaṁ vattetīti cakkavattī.
anya-e0803n7:237_12: Evaṁ kattukārakavasena īkārantattaṁ gahetvā katthaci labbhamānampi ikārantattaṁ anapekkhitvā buddhavacanānurūpena ‘‘sārathino cakkavattino’’tiādīni nokārantarūpāni gahetvā daṇḍīnayena yojetabbāni ‘‘daṇḍinī’’tiādikaṁ vajjitabbaṁ vajjetvā.
anya-e0803n7:237_13: Evaṁ ‘‘seṭṭhino sārathino cakkavattino sāmino’’tiādīni nokārantāniyeva rūpāni ñeyyāni.
anya-e0803n7:238_1: ‘‘Tāta tayo seṭṭhino amhākaṁ bahūpakārā’’ti ca ‘‘te katabhattakiccā ‘mahāseṭṭhino mayaṁ gamissāmā’ti vadiṁsū’’ti ca ‘‘sārathino āhaṁsū’’ti ca ‘‘dve cakkavattino’’ti ca evamādīni.
anya-e0803n7:238_2: Tattha kiñcāpi katthaci ‘‘seṭṭhi sārathi’’iccādi rassattapāṭho dissati,
anya-e0803n7:238_3: tathāpi so sabhāvena rassattabhāvo pāṭho na hoti,
anya-e0803n7:239_2: tathāpi isisaddena samānagatikattā isisaddassa aggisaddena samānapadamālattā agginayena padamālā kātabbā.
anya-e0803n7:239_3: Nanu ca bho ettha tassīlattho dissati ‘‘mahante sīlakkhandhādayo dhamme esanasīloti mahesī’’ti,
anya-e0803n7:239_4: tasmā ‘‘bhūmisāyī’’ti padassa viya daṇḍīnayeneva padamālā kātabbāti?
anya-e0803n7:239_6: Imassa hi ‘‘mahante sīlakkhandhādayo dhamme esi gavesi esitvā ṭhitoti mahesī’’ti atassīlattho eva yujjati.
anya-e0803n7:239_8: Isisaddena cāyaṁ saddo īsakaṁ samāno kevalaṁ samāsapariyosāne dīghavasena uccāriyati,
anya-e0803n7:239_10: Yasmā rassattaṁ gahetvā tassa padamālākaraṇaṁ yujjati,
anya-e0803n7:239_12: Na hi sāṭṭhakathe tepiṭake buddhavacane katthacipi catutthīchaṭṭhekavacanarūpaṁ viya ‘‘mahesino’’ti paccattopayogālapanabahuvacanarūpaṁ dissati.
anya-e0803n7:239_13: Tasmā īkārantavasena uccāritassapi sato rassavasena uccāritassa viya ‘‘mahesi, mahesī, mahesayo. Mahesiṁ, mahesī, mahesayo.
anya-e0803n7:239_15: Apica mahesīsaddo yattha rājaggubbarivācako, tattha itthiliṅgo hoti, tabbasena pana ‘‘mahesī, mahesī, mahesiyo. Mahesiṁ, mahesī, mahesiyo.
anya-e0803n7:239_16: Mahesiyā’’ti ca vakkhamānaitthīnayena padamālā kātabbā. Hatthīsadde kathanti?
anya-e0803n7:239_17: Hatthīsaddassa pana hattho assa atthīti evaṁ īkārantavasena gahaṇe ‘‘hatthino’’ti rūpaṁ bhavati.
anya-e0803n7:239_19: Tasseva tasmiṁyevatthe rassaṁ katvā gahaṇe ‘‘hatthayo’’ti rūpaṁ bhavati. Tathā hi –
anya-e0803n7:240_0: ‘‘Haṁsā koñcā mayūrā ca, hatthayo pasadā migā;
anya-e0803n7:241_0: Sabbe sīhassa bhāyanti, natthi kāyasmi tulyatā.
anya-e0803n7:243_0: Sopi tattha mahā hoti, neva bālo sarīravā’’ti
anya-e0803n7:244_1: Evamassa daṇḍīnayena ca agginayena ca dvidhā padamālā, veditabbā.
anya-e0803n7:244_2: Iminā nayena avuttesupi ṭhānesu pāḷinayānurūpena porāṇaṭṭhakathānurūpena ca padamālā yojetabbā.
anya-e0803n7:245_0: Ettāvatā bhūdhātumayānaṁ pulliṅgānaṁ nāmikapadamālā saddhiṁ liṅgantarehi saddantarehi atthantarehi ca nānappakārato dassitā.
anya-e0803n7:248_0: Sadā suṭṭhu cinteti vāceti yo so,
anya-e0803n7:250_0: Iti navaṅge sāṭṭhakathe piṭakattaye byappathagatīsu viññūnaṁ
